top_comments.comment: I think the wild card was really the winner 🤭

Personally, I loved the submission painting of Emily’s. It was naive but extremely charming and intricate. However, when she chose to change mediums, her canvas didn’t grab me by the shoulder’s and say…that’s it! Thanks so much for the post as we wait weekly for it’s appearance!
The wildcard winner created by far my favourite painting—brilliant!
Why don’t we see an artist representing the wildcards in the semis?

comments_since_last_sample.body: Thanks so much for this upload! I was rather disappointed in all the works of this episode, some of the submissions held a real promise but then the results... meh. Funny how they said 'we see a lot of this kind of art' about Jim's painting because I feel like I see that style in every episode, a kind of blocky muddy colour thing that looks like it was painted in the 1930s-1960s. I like it but it's a bit old-hat to me now and frustrating that the judges tend to favour it. The wild card blew them all away, fantastic piece.
